member.name: M:Unigine.VREyeTracking.hasFeatureRequestCalibration const
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if eye tracking calibration can be requested via the API.
member.returns: true if eye tracking calibration can be requested via the API; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Unigine.VREyeTracking.hasFeaturePupilDiameter const
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if pupil diameter data is available.
member.returns: true if pupil diameter data is available; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Unigine.VREyeTracking.hasFeatureIrisDiameter const
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if iris diameter data is available.
member.returns: true if iris diameter data is available; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Unigine.VREyeTracking.hasFeaturePupilIrisDiameterRatio const
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if the ratio between pupil and iris diameters is available.
member.returns: true if the ratio between pupil and iris diameters is available; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Unigine.VREyeTracking.hasFeatureOpenness const
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if eye openness data (e.g., blink state or squinting) is available.
member.returns: true if eye openness data is available; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Unigine.VREyeTracking.requestCalibration
member.summary: Triggers the gaze calibration sequence, if gaze tracking has been enabled in Varjo settings and the Varjo system is in a state where it can bring up the calibration UI.

member.name: F:Unigine.VREyeTracking.STATUS_INVALID
member.summary: Data is not available, user is not wearing the device or eyes cannot be found.

member.name: F:Unigine.VREyeTracking.STATUS_ADJUST
member.summary: User is wearing the device, but gaze tracking is being calibrated.

member.name: F:Unigine.VREyeTracking.EYE_STATUS_INVALID
member.summary: Eye is not tracked and not visible (for example, eye is shut).

member.name: F:Unigine.VREyeTracking.EYE_STATUS_VISIBLE
member.summary: Eye is visible but not reliably tracked (for example, saccade or blink).

member.name: F:Unigine.VREyeTracking.EYE_STATUS_COMPENSATED
member.summary: Eye is tracked but quality compromised (for example, headset has moved after calibration).
